pages.title: Taiyaki Master Ultimate Form
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Blade (2004, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:blade/devices/taiyaki_secret_weapon)Taiyaki Secret Weapon$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slowness$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Resistance$(li)Flame Slash II$(li)Strength II
